Ndipo amene akutsamira kwa Allah (pa zinthu zake zonse), ndiye kuti Allah ali wokwana kwa iye (kumkonzera chilichonse), ndithu Allah Ngokwaniritsa cholinga Chake ndi chofuna Chake. Ndithu chinthu chilichonse Allah wachipatsa mlingo wake woyenera (ndipo sichingaupyole)
